Here's the final Fortran code:

program main
   implicit none

   ! Variables for first step
   character(len=1000) :: input_str
   integer :: c = 0
   character(len=1), dimension(1000) :: stack
   integer :: stack_ptr = 0
   integer :: first_result

   ! Variables for second step
   integer :: x, r, ndigits = 0
   integer, dimension(100) :: digits
   integer :: second_result

   ! Variables for third step
   character(len=100) :: third_str
   integer :: len, score = 0
   character(len=1) :: p, q, my_char, actual_char

   ! Read input
   read(*, '(a)') input_str

   ! Process first step
   do i = 1, len_trim(input_str)
      ! Push to stack
      stack_ptr = stack_ptr + 1
      stack(stack_ptr) = input_str(i:i)

      !
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
Check for pairs
      do
         if (stack_ptr < 2) exit
         ! Pop two
         p = stack(stack_ptr)
         stack_ptr = stack_ptr - 1
         q = stack(stack_ptr) stack_ptr = stack_ptr - 1

         if ((p == '1' .and. q == '0') .or. (p == '0' .and. q == '1')) then
             c = c + 1
         else
             ! Push back
             stack_ptr = stack_ptr + 1
             stack(stack_ptr) = q
             stack_ptr = stack_ptr + 1
             stack(stack_ptr) = p
             exit
         end if
      end do
   end do

   first_result = c * 2

   ! Process second step
   x = first_result
   ndigits = 0
   do while (x > 0)
      integer :: original_x = x
      r = mod(original_x, 10)
      x = original_x / 10

      if ((9 - r) < r) then
          if ((original_x / 10 == 0) .and. (9 - r == 0)) then
              ndigits = ndigits + 1
              digits(ndigits) = r
          else
              ndigits = ndigits + 1
              digits(ndigits) = 9 - r
          end if
      else
          ndigits = ndigits + 1
          digits(ndigits) = r
      end if
   end do

   second_result = 0
   do i = 1, ndigits
      second_result = second_result + digits(i) * 10**(i-1)
   end do

   ! Process third step
   write(third_str, '(i0)') second_result
   len = len_trim(third_str)
   score = 0

   do i = 1, len
      if (mod(i-1, 2) == 0) then
          my_char = 'g'
      else
          my_char = 'p'
      end if
      actual_char = third_str(i:i) if (actual_char /= my_char) then
          if (my_char == 'p') then
              score = score + 1
          else
              score = score - 1
          end if
      end if
   end do

   !
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
Output the score
   print *, score

end program main

program main 

   implicit none 

   ! Variables for first step 

   character(len=1000) :: input_str 

   integer :: c =0 

   character(len=1000) :: stack 

   integer :: stack_ptr =0

      ! Push to stack 

      stack_ptr = stack_ptr +1 

      stack(stack_ptr) = input_str(i:i) 

      ! Check for pairs 

      do 

         if (stack_ptr <2) exit 

         ! Pop two 

         p = stack(stack_ptr) 

         stack_ptr = stack_ptr -1 

         q = stack(stack_ptr) 

         stack_ptr = stack_ptr -1 

         if ( (p == '1' .and. q == '0') .or. (p == '0' .and. q == '1') ) then 

             c = c +1 

         else 

             ! Push back 

             stack_ptr = stack_ptr +1 

             stack(stack_ptr) = q 

             stack_ptr = stack_ptr +1 

             stack(stack_ptr) = p 

             exit 

         end if 

      end do 

   end do 

   first_result = c *2 

   ! Process second step 

   x = first_result 

   ndigits =0 

   do while (x >0) 

      original_x = x 

      r = mod(original_x,10) 

      x = original_x /10 

      if ( (9 - r) < r ) then 

          if ( (original_x /10 ==0) .and. (9 - r ==0) ) then 

              ndigits = ndigits +1 

              digits(ndigits) = r 

          else 

              ndigits = ndigits +1 

              digits(ndigits) = 9 - r 

          end if 

      else 

          ndigits = ndigits +1 

          digits(ndigits) = r 

      end if 

   end do 

   second_result =0 

   do i=1, ndigits 

      second_result = second_result + digits(i)*10**(i-1) 

   end do 

   ! Process third step 

   write(third_str, '(i0)') second_result 

   len = len_trim(third_str)

      else

      end if 

      actual_char = third_str(i:i)

          if (my_char == 'p') then 

              score = score +1 

          else 

              score = score -1 

          end if 

      end if 

   end do 

   ! Output the score 

   print*, score 

end program main

program main
   implicit none

   ! Variables for first step
   character(len=1000) :: input_str
   integer :: c = 0
   character(len=1), dimension(1000) :: stack
   integer :: stack_ptr = 0
   integer :: first_result

   ! Variables for second step
   integer :: x, r, ndigits = 0
   integer, dimension(100) :: digits
   integer :: second_result

   ! Variables for third step
   character(len=100) :: third_str
   integer :: len, score = 0
   character(len=1) :: p, q, my_char, actual_char

   ! Read input
   read(*, '(a)') input_str

   ! Process first step
   do i = 1, len_trim(input_str)
      ! Push to stack
      stack_ptr = stack_ptr + 1
      stack(stack_ptr) = input_str(i:i)

      ! Check for pairs
      do
         if (stack_ptr < 2) exit
         ! Pop two
         p = stack(stack_ptr)
         stack_ptr = stack_ptr - 1
         q = stack(stack_ptr)
         stack_ptr = stack_ptr - 1

         if ((p == '1' .and. q == '0') .or. (p == '0' .and. q == '1')) then
             c = c + 1
         else
             ! Push back
             stack_ptr = stack_ptr + 1
             stack(stack_ptr) = q
             stack_ptr = stack_ptr + 1
             stack(stack_ptr) = p
             exit
         end if
      end do
   end do

   ndigits = 0

      integer :: original_x = x
      r = mod(original_x, 10)
      x = original_x / 10

      if ((9 - r) < r) then
          if ((original_x / 10 == 0) .and. (9 - r == 0)) then
              ndigits = ndigits + 1

          else

              digits(ndigits) = 9 - r
          end if
      else
          ndigits = ndigits + 1
          digits(ndigits) = r
      end if
   end do

   second_result = 0

      second_result = second_result + digits(i) * 10**(i-1)
   end do

   ! Process third step

          else
              score = score - 1
          end if
      end if
   end do

   ! Output the score

end program main
